entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10.
